meta.content: USA TODAY delivers current national and local news, sports, entertainment, finance, technology, and more through award-winning journalism, photos, and videos.

img.alt: Gaza protests dim the glitz of Biden, Obama, Clinton gala in NYC

div.div: Gaza protests dim the glitz of Biden, Obama, Clinton gala in NYC
